name: Omi Oh My AI
description:
What would happen if you took an incredibly clever AI made in the 90’s and used it to help you make a puzzle game? You’d get Omi Oh My AI! Go on a captchavating adventure through over 100 image, word, and number puzzles inspired by internet security (and a healthy love of dogs).

SELECT THE DOGS

But how could we make a game all about constantly needing to prove you are not a robot and make it into something fun? Omi did that for us! AI do not see the world the way we do, so you will need to learn to see through their eyes. Don’t expect it to be easy!


NULL REFERENCE EXCEPTION

The bugs and glitches you come across are all just part of Omi’s charm. We’ve tested thoroughly to identify any game-breaking bugs, but be sure to check our website and steam documentation if you come across anything that you are unable to figure out on your own!


Omi Oh My AI was made possible with funding from Screenwest and Lotterywest
